input_text.Prompt:
Given a item name and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Kamik Squirt Rain Boot (Toddler/Little Kid)

Item keywords:
100% Rubber
Imported
Rubber sole
Shaft measures approximately 7" from arch
Heel measures approximately 0.5"
Boot opening measures approximately 11" around
Waterproof
Flexible sole
Recyclable
Reflective patches

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Kamik Squirt Rain Boots are made from 100% rubber, so they’re completely waterproof. They’re also very flexible, so you can easily move around in them, and they have a comfortable, cushioned sole. These are great for wearing in the rain or snow, since they’ll keep your feet dry, and they have reflective patches so you can be safe and visible at night. These boots are imported, and come in lots of fun colors. They’re very easy to put on and take off, and can be recycled when they get old.
input_text.Response B: This adorable rain boot features a soft, flexible upper with reflective patches for added safety, a non-slip, waterproof rubber outsole, and an easy-on side gore.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
